name: Old Town Road
lyrics:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Montero Lamar Hill/Kiowa Roukema
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Montero Lamar Hill/Kiowa Roukema
[00:12.54]Yeah, I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road (我要骑着马 驰骋在这老城旧路)
[00:16.96]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more (我要骑着马直到我精疲力尽)
[00:20.51]I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road (我要骑着马 驰骋在这老城旧路)
[00:24.11]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more (Kio, Kio) (我要骑着马直到我精疲力尽（Kio是音乐制作人的tag）)
[00:27.64]I got the horses in the back (我身后跟着马)
[00:29.56]Horse tack is attached (马鞍已经装好)
[00:31.42]Hat is matte black (戴上黑色磨砂帽)
[00:33.18]Got the boots that's black to match (再配双黑靴)
[00:34.98]Ridin' on a horse, ha (骑在马背上)
[00:36.69]You can whip your Porsche (你可以开着你的保时捷)
[00:38.38]I been in the valley (我在山涧穿梭时)
[00:39.99]You ain't been up off that porch, now (你还没开出家门口)
[00:42.18]Can't nobody tell me nothin' (无需他人对我说教)
[00:46.02]You can't tell me nothin' (你别对我指指点点)
[00:49.47]Can't nobody tell me nothin' (无需他人指手画脚)
[00:52.80]You can't tell me nothin' (我理都不想理你)
[00:56.41]Ridin' on a tractor (开着我的拖拉机)
[00:57.97]Lean all in my bladder (我膀胱里都蓄着力量)
[00:59.79]Cheated on my baby (曾背叛亲爱的她)
[01:01.50]You can go and ask her (你甚至可以去问她)
[01:03.31]My life is a movie (我的人生就像场电影)
[01:04.99]Bull ridin' and boobies (骑过牛)
[01:06.74]Cowboy hat from Gucci (戴着Gucci的牛仔帽)
[01:08.47]Wrangler on my booty (穿着Wrangler（牛仔品牌）的裤子)
[01:10.38]Can't nobody tell me nothin' (无需他人对我说教)
[01:14.05]You can't tell me nothin' (你别对我指指点点)
[01:17.72]Can't nobody tell me nothin' (无需他人对我说教)
[01:21.11]You can't tell me nothin' (你别指手画脚)
[01:24.77]Yeah, I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road (我要骑着马 驰骋在这老城旧路)
[01:27.57]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more (我要骑着马直到我精疲力尽)
[01:31.62]I'm gonna take my horse to the old town road (我要骑着马 驰骋在这老城旧路)
[01:34.65]I'm gonna ride 'til I can't no more (我要骑着马直到我精疲力尽)
[01:38.21]I got the—I got the—I got the—I got the— (我有过 有过 一匹马)
[01:41.62]
